title: A birthday request to the Reds.
body:
For my birthday this year, i've gave it some thought, and i would LOVE the chance to play a match with the game's creators. If you'd like, we can set up when we can play.

You don't _have_ to say yes, but it would be cool.

Regardless, happy holidays to you guys, and anyone reading this post.

replies.body: RIOT MAKE THIS MANS DREAMS COME TRUE!
When's your birthday? My wife's is today and I empathise with people who have their birthday so close to Christmas (you can't just combine gifts yo that's not cool).
Let me know as well! I'd be game for a birthday game :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Rainslight,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sHhGuEot,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-12-24T07:27:17.023+0000)
>
> Let me know as well! I'd be game for a birthday game :3

:D you have no idea how happy i was to read that.

:3 

I'll be back to my desktop on the 29th. So if you don't mind waiting a few days, we'll def play then.

MERRY XMAS AS WELL

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Rainslight,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sHhGuEot,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-25T06:12:47.099+0000)
>
> :3 
> 
> I'll be back to my desktop on the 29th. So if you don't mind waiting a few days, we'll def play then.
> 
> MERRY XMAS AS WELL

I can totally wait til then. Merry Christmas to you too!
Hey! I think I missed the first match, but I'd be game for a second one whenever you guys want ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Rainslight,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sHhGuEot,comment-id=000600000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-30T00:42:04.759+0000)
>
> Hey! I think I missed the first match, but I'd be game for a second one whenever you guys want ^^

Sure, what time's good for you?
I'm good any time! What works for you! :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Rainslight,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sHhGuEot,comment-id=00060000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-30T20:40:14.591+0000)
>
> I'm good any time! What works for you! :3

I should be able to at about 1:00-ish tomorrow afternoon, that cool?
1:00 Eastern? Works for me ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sHhGuEot,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-12-24T07:00:40.004+0000)
>
> When's your birthday? My wife's is today and I empathise with people who have their birthday so close to Christmas (you can't just combine gifts yo that's not cool).

Mine was the 22nd
That's Right, you can't freaking combine gifts (december 20th here)
Good luck. I know what i will ask for when my bday comes, i just think if it will be in range of few thousands or merely one thousand RP. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Something i should have thought to ask before, what time are we planning to start? Its about 1 here because we were having problems with our wifi on our motom, i hope i didnt miss my chance!

WE DID IT!

gg dude glhf being all responsible and older >;)
No matter how shaky the preseason may seem, I love riot because you guys are just amazing :3
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

> [{quoted}](name=yeramora,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sHhGuEot,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-23T01:48:51.791+0000)
>
> {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

The rarest.
:D
Its my bday and i didnt ask for this
Never gonna happen.
Why? This is actually quite common of a thing...
